label: launch iOS simulator
command: xcrun simctl boot 'iPhone 16 Pro' && open -a Simulator

label: build iOS(debug)
command: xcodebuild -project swiftApp/swiftApp.xcodeproj -scheme swiftApp -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16 Pro' build

label: run iOS(debug)
command: xcodebuild -project swiftApp/swiftApp.xcodeproj -scheme swiftApp -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16 Pro' build && xcrun simctl install booted build/ios/Debug-iphonesimulator/swiftApp.app && xcrun simctl launch booted io.github.kkoshin.muse
